sqlQuery.name: Organisms
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct oa.source_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa, apidb.Organism o where oa.component_taxon_id = o.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: OrganismAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, source_id as old_source_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: organismAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, oa.species, oa.organism_name AS organism_full, oa. organism_name AS organism, oa.organism_name AS hyperlinkName, CASE genome_source WHEN 'gb' THEN 'GenBank' WHEN 'jkissinger' THEN 'Kissinger Lab' ELSE genome_source END as data_source, genome_dataset.genome_dataset_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa left join (select oa.source_id, dsp.description, dsp.dataset_presenter_id as genome_dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.Datasetdatasource dd, apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa where dd.category = 'Genomes' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id) genome_dataset on genome_dataset.source_id = oa.source_id

sqlQuery.name: Organisms
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, organism_name AS organism from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: GenomeSequencingAndAnnotation
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, dsp.description from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.Datasetdatasource dd, apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa where dd.category = 'Genomes' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: GenomeVersionHistory
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct oa.source_id, dsh.genome_version from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.DatasetHistory dsh, apidbTuning.Datasetsource dd, apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa where dd.category = 'Genomes' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id and dsh.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id and dsh.genome_version like 'GC%'
